closing: I look forward to working with you
aboutText1: I am a web developer with over 1 year of experience.
aboutText2: I specialize in Vue, Nuxt and Laravel.
aboutText3: Beyond the code, I take special care about accessibility, performance  and creating digital products that people enjoy using.
kenjaCloudDescription: A school management system designed to manage teachers, students, attendance, grading, timetables, and other operations for Japanese schools.
poddyDescription: A podcast management system that allows users to upload podcasts, write blogs, customize themes, and manage guests with a smooth backend and dynamic frontend.
laPayyDescription: A takeout subscription platform where users subscribe monthly to favorite restaurants for daily meal deliveries, streamlining customer management efficiently.
